text: Munaphikasakale muminasakalaka mati ka’ba, ‘ami tomalokara lagata nachilone? Te'omloke ka’ba, ‘haya, kintu tomaloke nije'i nijaka bipadagrasta karaicha arau tomaloke pratiksa karaichila arau sandeha karaichila arau micha akanksa'i tomalokaka prataraita karai raakhichila, arau arasesata allahara nirdesa ahi ga’la, arau (antima samayalaike) mahapratarake tomalokaka allaha samparke prataraita karaichila’
